message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be highly valuable to you.  I'm offering it to you at a price of $1000000. I understand this is a significant investment, but I'm confident the potential benefits will outweigh the cost.  I'm sure you'll agree that this is an exceptional opportunity.  If you're interested, please let me know and we can discuss the details further.  I'm available to answer any questions you may have.
